pages.text: The Firepit is a early game furnace. $(br)It use wood logs as fuel. $(br)To create a firepit, you need 3 wooden sticks, a log and a fire starter, you can add some straw or kindling to have a better chance at succeding. $(br)Put the 3 sticks and the log on a block and right click with the firestarter to create it. $(br)It may not work on the first try.
